remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] 不是自發伺服器的實體。 are not autonomous server entities. 相反地，服務是裝載，例如 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 提供核心伺服器的網路設備的環境中的元件。Instead, the service is a component hosted in an environment such as the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) that provides core server networking facilities. 具體來說，服務不會不繫結至和網路通訊端上接聽內送要求至 Representational State Transfer (REST) 項目點。Specifically, a service does not bind to and listen on a network socket for incoming requests to its Representational State Transfer (REST) entry points. 此主應用程式 (Host) 會處理與網路的直接互動並且支援快取、延展性 (Scalability) 和驗證模組。The host handles direct interactions with the network and support caching, scalability, and authentication modules. [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] 定義泛型裝載介面，擷取它的實作，從特定主機。 defines a generic hosting interface that abstracts its implementation from a specific host. 這可讓[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]在各種裝載環境中執行。This allows [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] to run in a range of hosting environments. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[裝載資料服務](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/hosting-the-data-service-wcf-data-services.md)。For more information, see [Hosting the Data Service](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/hosting-the-data-service-wcf-data-services.md).
